WorkflowInfo.Name: Monitor windows event log
WorkflowInfo.Description: Monitor application security and system event logs and send errors
WorkflowInfo.Xoml: <SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:GetWindowEventLogs;Assembly=GetWindowEventLogs, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ParallelActivity x:Name="SCAN_EVENT_LOG"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns0:GetWindowEventLogs Password="" Description="Get the logs of the windows according to the event type." TimeInSeconds="0" FilterComputer="" HostName="Localhost" DisplayName="Get Windows Event Logs" IsValid="True" HostId="1" FilterSource="" FilterDescription="" FilterEventCode="" FilterUser="" MaxAge="1.00:00:00" x:Name="getWindowEventLogs1" Timeout="00:01:00" FilterType="Error" UserName="" EventType="Application" FilterCategory="" TypeName="GetWindowEventLogs" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" ResultSet="%getWindowEventLogs1%" ResultSetName="getWindowEventLogs1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="APPLICATION"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns2:ReturnValue Value="0" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Not Equals" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Not Equals("&&&","0")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns3:ConvertToHTMLTable DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." IsValid="True" Value="%getWindowEventLogs1%" /> <ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Application Errors" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" x:Name="sendEmail1" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="%convertToHTMLTable1%" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="{x:Null}" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns2:ReturnValue Value="0" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Equals" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals("&&&","0")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns5:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"> <ns0:GetWindowEventLogs Password="" Description="Get the logs of the windows according to the event type." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="SECURITY"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity3"> <ns2:ReturnValue Value="0" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue3" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Not Equals" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Not Equals("&&&","0")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity."
